title: The Difficulty of Breathing, a simply complex story...
description: Has the man in the moon ever whispered to you? Did you ever wondered what happened to your white knight who was supposed to come and rescue you? Follow the story, trials, joys and tears of this heart-lifting and heart-breaking story. Born different than everyone else and raised in foster homes through abuse and neglect, there shines hope and joy, as well as grief and sorrow. Is it testament to strength or an example of life's cruelty? Love finds a path and life moves forward. Decide for yourself and connect with the characters in this amazing story of survival, love and life.
author: Joe Egly
